director.name: 安东尼奥·达·席尔瓦 Antonio Da Silva

introduction: This film is a result of a trip to Cuba in February 2019, with lots of sexual encounters with hot hung Cubans. Cuba remains one of the world’s least internet-connected societies. The limitations of internet access in Cuba seem to accelerate such interactions and increase a sense of urgency. It turns the platform more into a gay telegram system than a chatting app. In Cuba there is an extremely grey line between gay and straight men. There are more tops than bottoms in Cuba for a very simple reason: in their mind’s eye if you are a top you’re not gay. It’s due to their macho man repressive culture.– It is a paradise for bottoms.
